channel.title: What's your story on the server HD crash?
channel.description:
Ok, I'd love to read everyone's story on this, I think it would be real interesting. We're all a part of the history of Black Mesa now. This will be forever remembered as "the great [u]insert description here[/u] of may 2nd 2009."
So, here's mine: I basically don't stay up late at nights, because I usually want to get up at around 7:00am, even on weekends, but today I stayed up (or rather yesterday night I stayed up) to talk to a friend on omgpop. It was odd, because I'd never done that before. So anyways I have Black Mesa's website stored in Opera's speed-dial, and I visit it frequently. So late in the night (or possibly early in the morning) I noticed that the page wasn't loading. I thought it was odd, but I figured it was probably my internet connection (and because I'm stupid and didn't test any other websites, I reset my router several times in desperation). Then finally I saw some sort of apache file tree. With like 2 folders and an html file. I had no idea that the entire hard drive had gone bad. But then hours later I saw the message about what had happened, and then finally this morning I woke up again, like 30 minutes ago, to find that the forums (or some replacement) were back online. So now I'm right here, and I'm glad to be one of the first registered users on the Black Mesa forums :wink:
So, tell me [i]your[/i] story!

item.title: What's your story on the server HD crash?
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Raminator:

What can I say? I live to give.

That’s beautiful. We appreciate the kisses.

Read full topic

And make us cookies.

item.title: What's your story on the server HD crash?
item.dc:creator: DoctorWeeTodd
item.description:
So 30 minutes ago, I had visited the BMS site for the first time in maybe a year. When the forums failed to recognize my user name, password and email, I came under the impression that they switched the forum servers again.

Then I went on this thread and realized there was a server crash.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your story on the server HD crash?
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
I was like, “Crap. They got hacked again. Time to restart my post count. I was almost to 500, too!”
I didn’t re-register until a couple hours ago, 'cause I’ve been too lazy and disappointed by the crash. But I’m back! Hooray!

Read full topic
item.source: What's your story on the server HD crash?

item.title: What's your story on the server HD crash?
item.dc:creator: Lolipopman
item.description:
One day, I went on vacation, and my mind went of of black mesa. As time went by, i forgot it moar and moar. And one day, I saw it on my favourite list, and tried to load the site. IT HAD CRACHED. I found a small blade in my desk, cut myself in the hand, and jammed a rusty nail through my achilles tendon. Then the website came back…

ok the knife is a lie…

Read full topic
item.source: What's your story on the server HD crash?
